alert.note: Alert for Norman (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 30 at 5:07AM CDT until May 05 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Marsh River at Shelly affecting Norman County. .Due to recent rainfall, river levels are looking to rise again back into Minor Flood Stage. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Marsh River at Shelly. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late Thursday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 16.5 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
